title: Hedgemark's Lapkin on Challenges to Hedge Fund Investing(Audio)
itunes:title: Hedgemark's Lapkin on Challenges to Hedge Fund Investing(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Andrew Lapkin, CEO of HedgeMark International, on the hedge fund landscape and the top drivers of hedge fund investors. Broadcasting live from the BNY Mellon Asset Servicing Conference in Tuscon, Arizona.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
